p: The results of sensitivity analyses show that the GCVs were respectively the lowest when the dfs of weekly minimum temperature, and cumulative rainfall in model (1) and DBSI in model (2) were set to 3, which justified the df selection in our models ( S5 Table and S6 Table). In addition, the results of LOOCV also showed that the performance of model (2) was better than model (1) ( S7 Table).
